des: Here we will enter the name of the product for which we are making the business plan.
Describe the measures or business innovations you will take. Think about what your feature does and how it works.
Think about why your decision is exciting and makes a way to grow the business.
Wow! You just imagined a brand new feature for the product and even created a mini business plan for it! The last slide of your business plan is called Growth Forecast.
